title: Red Receives the Mission
plot_change_note: Dialogue introduces Dr. Ilan (instead of Dr. Su) as the recipient of the package, and includes a direct confrontation between Mira and Wolf at home before Red sets out—whereas the original plot had only Mira and Red, with Wolf as a distant threat. Mira also shows maternal concern in dialogue, referencing Red's early morning departure, which was not present in the original plot. To match the dialogue, the updated plot includes Wolf's direct approach and Mira's protective stance, as well as her emotional concern for Red.

title: Checkpoint Ambush
plot_change_note: The dialogue shows Agent Kade communicating directly with Red, warning her about hostiles and backup, implying a degree of cooperation or forced alliance rather than pure pursuit. The updated plot reflects a scenario where Red and Kade are in contact—perhaps due to circumstances forcing collaboration or a temporary truce—while preserving core motivations and tension.

title: Escape and Revelation
